name: Footprints Festival

config_properties.name: Footprints Festival
config_properties.description: A curated discovery festival at TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht, showcasing emerging international artists across diverse genres.

ai_profile:
The 2026 *Footprints Festival* promises an eclectic and vibrant celebration of global music, uniting 11 artists from 10 countries. With a lineup spanning genres like Electronic, Jazz, Indie Pop, and Psychedelic Folk, the festival showcases an impressive range of musical styles. Notable highlights include Anatolian Rock from Turkey, Malian Desert Blues, and Traditional Iranian music, reflecting the festival's commitment to cultural diversity and innovative soundscapes.

Diversity is a cornerstone of this yearâ€™s festival, with 7 of the 11 artists identifying as people of color, and acts hailing from countries as varied as Germany, Nigeria, Brazil, and Iran. Gender representation remains a work in progress with two female-led acts, eight male-led acts, and one mixed-gender group. The festival continues to prioritize inclusivity by embracing artists who bring unique perspectives and sounds to the stage.

Audience enthusiasm for the lineup is evident, with an average artist rating of 7.73 and all 11 artists highly rated on Spotify, achieving 100% coverage. With a majority of acts receiving ratings between 8 and 9, fans can anticipate a stellar blend of rising stars and seasoned performers. *Footprints Festival 2026* is set to be a dynamic journey through sound, culture, and creativity.
